title: Two Brothers
description: Two brothers. In a van. And then a meteor hit. And they ran as fast as they could, from giant cat monsters. And then a giant tornado came. And that’s when things got knocked into 12th gear. A Mexican armada shows up. With weapons made from tomatoes. And you better bet your bottom dollar that these two brothers know how to handle business.
altHero: two cool brothers wearing sunglasses can’t believe what’s going on
alt1: two huge cats with sharp teeth attack the brothers
alt2: spaceships shaped like sombreros approach Earth
alt4: the moon crashes into the Earth on fire
